home.title: KalBook
home.subtitle:
Everything your service business needs - all in one place.

Online bookings, smart scheduling, staff and client management, automated reminders and messages.

Easy to use, fast to set up, fully in Hebrew.

Get started today!

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to run your service business smoothly

setup3min.title: Set up in 3 minutes
setup3min.desc: Pick your business type, add services and your first team member. You're good to go.
setup3min.details: Get started in just 3 minutes! Our intuitive onboarding process guides you through selecting your business category, adding your services with pricing, and setting up your first team member. No technical knowledge required - just follow the simple steps and you'll be ready to accept bookings in no time. Perfect for busy professionals who want to get up and running quickly.

easyCalendar.title: Smart calendar
easyCalendar.desc: Daily, weekly, or monthly view. Drag to reschedule, filter by staff.
easyCalendar.details: Experience the power of a truly smart calendar system. Switch seamlessly between daily, weekly, and monthly views to see your schedule exactly how you need it. Drag and drop appointments to reschedule instantly. Filter by staff members, services, or appointment status. Color-code your appointments for quick visual identification. Sync with Google Calendar to keep everything in one place. The calendar adapts to your workflow, making scheduling effortless and intuitive.

smartCustomers.title: Smarter clients
smartCustomers.desc: Full client profiles with history, notes, and marketing consents.
smartCustomers.details: Build lasting relationships with comprehensive client management. Each customer profile includes their complete booking history, personal preferences, special notes, and contact information. Track their favorite services, preferred staff members, and appointment patterns. Manage marketing consents and communication preferences. Add custom notes for special requests or important information. Access client data instantly to provide personalized service and build customer loyalty.

reminders.title: Reminders that work
reminders.desc: Send confirmations and reminders via email and WhatsApp. Fewer calls, fewer no-shows.
reminders.details: Automate your communication and reduce no-shows with intelligent reminder system. Send automatic appointment confirmations when bookings are made. Schedule reminders via email and WhatsApp before appointments. Customize reminder timing (24 hours, 2 hours, etc.) to fit your business needs. Pre-built message templates save you time while maintaining a professional tone. Track delivery status and see which reminders are most effective. Spend less time on the phone and more time serving customers.

bilingual.title: Bilingual & RTL ready
bilingual.desc: Hebrew and English support. Works right-to-left and left-to-right.
bilingual.details: Serve customers in their preferred language with full bilingual support. Switch seamlessly between Hebrew and English throughout the platform. Complete RTL (right-to-left) support for Hebrew text ensures natural reading experience. All interface elements, forms, and content automatically adapt to the selected language direction. Perfect for businesses serving diverse communities or operating in multilingual markets. Your booking pages, emails, and notifications all support multiple languages.

security.title: Simple and secure
security.desc: Email code login, pre-built message templates, and peace of mind.

analytics.title: Analytics & Insights
analytics.desc: Know what's working. Track revenue in real time, see booking trends, and understand your customers better.
analytics.details: Make data-driven decisions with comprehensive analytics and insights. Track revenue in real-time with detailed financial reports. Identify your most popular services and peak booking times. Understand customer behavior patterns and booking trends. See which staff members are busiest and optimize scheduling. Monitor no-show rates and cancellation patterns. Export reports for accounting or business planning. Visualize your business performance with easy-to-read charts and graphs.

qrCodes.title: QR Codes for Easy Booking
qrCodes.desc: From scan to scheduled. Create QR codes for booking pages or specific services. Share anywhere, book instantly.
qrCodes.details: Make booking effortless with QR code technology. Generate unique QR codes for your entire booking page or specific services. Print and display QR codes in your business, on business cards, or marketing materials. Customers simply scan with their phone camera and are instantly taken to your booking page. No app downloads required. Track which QR codes generate the most bookings. Perfect for walk-in customers, events, or promotional campaigns. From scan to scheduled appointment in seconds.

onlineBooking.title: 24/7 Online Booking
onlineBooking.desc: Always open. Let clients book anytime - even when you're off the clock.

groupServices.title: Group Services & Packages
groupServices.desc: Bundle services into packages like Haircut + Beard for easy upsells.
groupServices.details: Increase revenue with service packages and bundles. Create attractive packages that combine multiple services at a discounted rate. Examples include 'Haircut + Beard Trim', 'Full Service Package', or seasonal promotions. Customers can book entire packages in one click, saving time and increasing your average transaction value. Set package pricing to encourage upsells. Display packages prominently on your booking page. Track which packages are most popular and adjust your offerings accordingly.

activityLogs.title: Activity Logs
activityLogs.desc: Track every change and action in your business, automatically.

customBranding.title: Custom Branding
customBranding.desc: Make your booking page yours with your logo and brand colors.
customBranding.details: Create a booking experience that reflects your brand identity. Upload your logo to display prominently on your booking page. Customize colors to match your brand palette. Choose fonts and styling that align with your business aesthetic. Add custom images and banners to showcase your services. Your booking page becomes an extension of your brand, building trust and recognition. All emails and notifications can also be branded with your colors and logo. Stand out from competitors with a professional, cohesive brand experience.

mobileOptimized.title: Mobile-Optimized Booking
mobileOptimized.desc: Fully responsive booking experience that looks great on any device.
mobileOptimized.details: Ensure every customer can book easily, regardless of their device. Our booking pages are fully responsive and optimized for mobile phones, tablets, and desktops. Touch-friendly interface makes booking on mobile devices effortless. Fast loading times keep customers engaged. The booking experience adapts perfectly to any screen size. Most customers book on mobile - make sure your booking process is smooth and intuitive on all devices. No pinching, zooming, or scrolling required.

noShowPrevention.title: No-Show Prevention
noShowPrevention.desc: Automated reminders help reduce missed appointments and keep your schedule full.
noShowPrevention.details: Minimize lost revenue from no-shows with our comprehensive prevention system. Automated email and WhatsApp reminders sent before appointments significantly reduce no-show rates. Confirmation requests ensure customers are committed to their bookings. Track no-show history to identify patterns and problematic clients. Set up automatic waitlists to fill cancelled appointments quickly. Some plans include deposit requirements to secure bookings. Keep your schedule full and your revenue consistent with proactive no-show prevention.

recurringAppointments.title: Recurring Appointments
recurringAppointments.desc: Set up repeat bookings for regular clients. Weekly, monthly, or custom schedules - save time and never miss a regular appointment.
recurringAppointments.details: Streamline scheduling for your regular customers with recurring appointments. Set up automatic repeat bookings on weekly, bi-weekly, monthly, or custom schedules. Perfect for clients who visit regularly - haircuts, therapy sessions, training, or maintenance appointments. Customers can book once and have appointments automatically scheduled going forward. Save time by eliminating the need to manually book each appointment. Never miss a regular client's appointment. Customers receive reminders for each recurring appointment. Easily modify or cancel recurring schedules as needed.

items.q: How does this help me day to day?
items.a: Customers book themselves, you see everything in the calendar, get automatic confirmation and reminders, and save calls.

items.q: Is it complicated to set up?
items.a: No. Sign up, fill in a few details, and the system is ready to work.
Yes. You can share a booking link and receive custom reminders.
Yes. KalBook supports Hebrew, English, Arabic, and Russian with full right-to-left (RTL) and left-to-right (LTR) layout support. Your booking page can be displayed in any of these languages.
Your data security is our priority. We use secure authentication methods, encrypted data storage, and follow industry best practices to protect your business and customer information.

items.q: Can I use QR codes for booking?
items.a: Yes. You can generate QR codes for your booking page or specific services. Customers can scan the QR code and instantly access the booking interface. Perfect for in-store displays, business cards, or marketing materials.

items.q: Does it work on mobile phones?
items.a: Absolutely. KalBook is fully mobile-optimized with a responsive design that works seamlessly on smartphones and tablets. Your customers can book appointments from any device, and you have full access to all features on mobile.

items.q: Can I customize my booking page?
items.a: Yes. With custom branding features, you can add your logo, choose your brand colors, and personalize your booking page to match your business identity. Available in any plan.

items.q: Can I set up recurring appointments?
items.a: Yes. You can create recurring appointments for regular clients with weekly, monthly, or custom schedules. This saves time and ensures you never miss a regular appointment.

Yes. You can bundle multiple services into packages (like Haircut + Beard) for easy upsells and promotions. This feature helps increase revenue and simplifies booking for customers who want multiple services.
Yes. We offer a 14-day free trial with no credit card required. You can explore all features and see how KalBook works for your business before committing to a plan.
Yes. You can cancel your subscription at any time with no long-term contracts or cancellation fees. Your plan will remain active until the end of your current billing period.

Basic plan includes 1 staff member and up to 100 bookings per month. Professional plan offers up to 5 staff, unlimited bookings, advanced features like calendar integrations and analytics. Business plan includes unlimited staff, multiple locations, priority support, and API access.

items.q: Can I integrate with Google Calendar?
items.a: Yes. Professional and Business plans include integration with Google Calendar, Outlook, and Apple Calendar. Sync your appointments automatically and manage your schedule across all your devices.

items.q: What happens if I need help?
items.a: We offer support through email and our help center. Business plan customers receive priority support with faster response times. We're here to help you succeed with KalBook.

section1.title: Nature of the Service
section1.p1: KalBook is a SaaS system for managing businesses and appointment-based services, including, among others: appointment calendar, customer management, employee management, sending reminders, generating reports, and additional operations for businesses.
section1.p2: The system enables business owners to open a business profile, define services, availability and schedules, and allow end customers to book appointments and receive messages and reminders.
section1.p3: The Company is not a party to agreements, payments, appointment scheduling or the actual provision of services to end businesses, and is not responsible for the quality, availability, suitability or performance of services provided by business owners to their customers.
section1.p4: All transactions between a business owner and a customer (including appointment scheduling, cancellations, payments, refunds, professional liability, etc.) are made directly between the parties and are their sole responsibility.

section2.p1: Any use of the system, including browsing, registration, data entry, appointment scheduling or use of various features, constitutes a declaration that you have read, understood and agreed to these terms of use.
section2.p2: The Company may update these terms of use at any time, at its sole discretion. An updated version will be published in the system and will take effect upon publication. Continued use of the system after publication of an update constitutes agreement to the updated terms.
section2.p3: The Company may at any time change the structure of the services, the design, the scope of functionality, add or remove features, discontinue services, or restrict access - all without prior notice and therefore the user shall have no claim and/or demand.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This privacy policy describes how Sel-Phone Ltd. ID 317492429, owner of the brands "KalBook" and "Kal-Book Solutions" (hereinafter: "the Company", "KalBook", "we"), collects, uses, stores and shares personal information collected in connection with the use of the KalBook.io website and application and all associated digital interfaces (hereinafter together: "the Application" or "the System").
privacy.intro2: This privacy policy is an integral part of the terms of use of the KalBook application. Use of the application indicates that you have read, understood and agreed to this privacy policy. If you do not agree to this policy, you must refrain from using the application.
privacy.genderNote: This policy is formulated in masculine form for convenience only, but applies equally to all genders, individuals and corporations.

section1.title: Types of Information We Collect
section1.subtitle1: Information Provided Voluntarily by the User
section1.p1: When using the application, you may be required to provide personal information, such as:
section1.item6: Basic payment details, if purchasing a subscription through the application (credit card details are processed by an external payment provider and are not fully stored with us)
section1.subtitle2: Information About Business Owners' End Customers
section1.p2: Business owners using KalBook may enter information about their customers into the system, such as:
section1.customerItem4: Appointment history, services consumed, notes, etc.
section1.p3: With respect to this information, the business owner is the entity that determines the purposes of use of the information vis-à-vis their customers, and KalBook acts as a management and appointment system for them. The business owner is responsible for compliance with legal provisions towards their customers.
section1.subtitle3: Technical and Analytical Information About Application Use
section1.p4: When using the application, we may collect certain technical information, such as:
section1.techItem3: Application pages visited, duration of stay and access times
section1.techItem4: Device identifiers, session identifier, and additional statistical usage data
section1.p5: The application may use cookies and similar technologies for proper operation, security, saving user preferences, and improving the user experience. Further details are provided in the "Cookies" section below.

section2.title: Purposes of Information Use
section2.subtitle1: Operating the Application and Providing Services, including:
section2.item1: Creating and managing a user account for a business owner
section2.item2: Managing appointment calendar, customers, employees and services
section2.item3: Sending appointment reminders, system messages and service notifications
section2.p1: Providing service and support to users, including responding to inquiries, handling malfunctions and improving service.
section2.p2: Personalizing the application user experience, displaying relevant content and suggestions related to your use of the system.
section2.p3: Billing, collection, subscription management and making payment-related adjustments.
section2.p4: Improving, developing and maintaining the application, including analyzing usage data to improve performance, features and interface.
section2.p5: Sending service information, updates on changes to the system or policy, and marketing content with your consent, as required by law.
section2.p6: Compliance with legal provisions, risk management, protecting the Company's rights, preventing fraud and maintaining system security.

section3.title: Legal Framework for Information Use
section3.p1: The use of personal information is made, among other things, based on one or more of the following bases:
section3.item1: Your consent to use the information for certain services.
section3.item2: The need to maintain the relationship between you and the Company (for example, activating a subscription and managing an account).
section3.item3: Legitimate interest of the Company, such as improving service, protecting the KalBook system and proper business management.
section3.item4: Compliance with legal obligations applicable to the Company.

section4.title: Disclosure of Information to Third Parties
section4.p1: We may disclose information to external service providers who assist us in operating the application, such as:
section4.p2: These providers receive access to information only as necessary to provide the service, and they must comply with confidentiality and information security obligations.
section4.p3: When you are a business owner using KalBook, the information you enter about your customers is stored in the system and displayed to you and authorized parties on your behalf according to your account settings.
section4.p4: When you are an end customer booking an appointment with a business using KalBook, some of the information you provide is disclosed to the business owner for managing the appointment and service.
section4.p5: We may disclose personal information if required by law, court order, request from a competent authority, or to protect our rights, users or third parties.
section4.subtitle4: Transfer in the Context of Structural Change
section4.p6: In case of merger, acquisition, sale of operations or transfer of assets of KalBook, we may transfer the information to the acquiring entity, subject to their commitment to maintain the information in accordance with this policy or a similar level privacy policy.
section4.p7: We do not sell personal information to third parties for independent commercial use of the information.

section5.title: Storage and Transfer of Information Outside Israel
section5.p1: Information may be stored on servers and cloud infrastructures of external providers, some of which may be located outside Israel.
section5.p2: In any case of transferring information outside Israel, the Company will act in accordance with applicable legal provisions regarding the transfer of personal information to other countries, and will ensure that appropriate protection levels apply to information recipients.

section6.title: Information Security
section6.p1: The Company implements reasonable and accepted information security measures, designed to reduce the risks of unauthorized intrusion, unauthorized use or exposure of personal information.
section6.p2: Our security measures include, among other things, use of identification means, access control, certain encryption of communication and internal access procedures.
section6.p3: However, there is no perfect security system. Absolute immunity from intrusion, breach, failures or unauthorized access cannot be guaranteed, and the user agrees that the Company will not be liable for damages caused by such events, provided the Company has taken reasonable protective measures.

section7.title: Information Retention
section7.p1: We will retain your personal information for the period necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected, and in accordance with legal provisions and our contractual obligations.
section7.p2: The Company may retain certain information even after account closure or discontinuation of application use, for compliance with legal obligations, managing legal proceedings, collection, managing business records and for backup and security purposes.
section7.p3: Statistical and anonymous information, which does not allow personal identification, may be retained indefinitely.

section8.title: User Rights Regarding Information
section8.p1: Subject to applicable law, you may have some of the following rights:
section8.p2: The right to contact us and request to know if personal information is held about you, and to review it as required by law.
section8.p3: If you find that information about you is incorrect, incomplete or outdated, you can request its correction or deletion, subject to legal requirements and our obligations to retain information.
section8.subtitle3: Right to Object to Direct Marketing Use
section8.p4: You can request at any time to stop receiving marketing messages from us. This can be done through the unsubscribe link in email messages, WhatsApp message or by direct contact with us at the contact details below. We may continue to send non-marketing service and operational messages.
section8.p5: To exercise your rights, you can contact us using the contact details at the end of the policy. We will examine your request and act in accordance with legal provisions.

section9.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
section9.p1: The application uses cookies and similar technologies for:
section9.item3: Improving user experience and performing statistical usage analysis
section9.item4: Security and identification of unusual activity
section9.p2: You can change your browser settings to block some or all cookies, however, complete blocking of cookies may impair some application functions.
section9.p3: We may also use external analytics services (such as Google Analytics or others) to collect aggregate usage data, subject to the terms of use and privacy of those third parties.

section10.title: Minors
section10.p1: The application is intended for use by adult users only, and in accordance with the age of consent according to law.
section10.p2: If we become aware that personal information about a minor has been collected in violation of this policy or in violation of law, we will act to delete the information reasonably and promptly, after receiving appropriate notice.

section11.title: Privacy Policy Updates
section11.p1: The Company may update the privacy policy from time to time, at its discretion. An updated version will be published in the application and will bear an update date.
section11.p2: Continued use of the application after a privacy policy update constitutes agreement to the updated policy. If you do not agree to the update, you must discontinue use of the application.

section12.title: Contact Regarding Privacy
section12.p1: For questions, requests or inquiries regarding this privacy policy and exercising your rights, you can contact us:
section12.p2: We will try to handle appropriate inquiries as soon as possible and in accordance with legal provisions.
